mapper.insert: insert into bobo.questionwarehouse (name, choice, blank, judge, startDate, endDate, examTime, times, answer, open) VALUE (#{name}, #{choice}, #{blank}, #{judge}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{examTime}, #{times}, #{answer}, 0);
mapper.update: update bobo.questionwarehouse set `name` = #{name}, answer = #{answer}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, times = #{times}, `open` = #{open} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, `name`, choice, blank, judge, startDate, endDate, examTime, times, answer from bobo.questionwarehouse where open = 1;
